name: Bow Man (itch)
description:
You live happily with your family in a cave, until one day, some strange blue person invade into your home. You must kill them to protect your home. All right,they got fancy equipment and guns. But you got your bow and skills, Let's shoot some arrows.

Controls:

Arrow Keys to move and jump;

Release Space Key to shoot arrow;

Hold Space Key to adjust shoot angle.

This is my entry for Ludum Dare 36 Compo, which means that every single part of the game (art, programming, sound effects) had to be made by one person in 48 hours. Check out my submission page if you like.
